item.description:
Get into the spirit of the fall season by picking apples! (This is the first day of fall) Besides a variety of apples now in season for picking, Russell Orchards also offers hayrides, cider pressing exhibits, a winery, bakery and store.

www.russellorchardsma.com

Meet outside the front of the store at 3:30.

Carpooling is encouraged. Please state in yur rsvp comments if you need or can offer a ride, and from which area.

Russell Orchards
143 Argilla Road
Ipswich MA 01938
978-356-5366
item.name: Apple Picking
